description._content:
In ur pandas, tickling ur unicorn

(this method is experimental and may change)

error._content: One of the required arguments for the method was not provided.
One of the arguments was specified with an illegal value.

error.message: Callback URL already in use for a different subscription
error._content: A different subscription already exists that uses the same callback URL.
The verification callback failed, or failed to return the expected response to confirm the subscription.

error.message: Service currently available only to pro accounts
error._content: PuSH subscriptions are currently restricted to Pro account holders.

error.message: Subscription awaiting verification callback response - try again later
error._content: A subscription with those details exists already, but it is in a pending (non-verified) state. Please wait a bit for the verification callback to complete before attempting to update the subscription.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
error._content: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: callback
argument._content: The url for the subscription endpoint. Limited to 255 bytes, and must be unique for this user, i.e. no two subscriptions for a given user may use the same callback url.

argument.name: verify
argument._content: The verification mode, either sync or async. See the Google PubSubHubbub spec for details.

argument.name: verify_token
argument._content: The verification token to be echoed back to the subscriber during the verification callback, as per the Google PubSubHubbub spec. Limited to 200 bytes.

argument.name: lease_seconds
argument._content: Number of seconds for which the subscription will be valid. Legal values are 60 to 86400 (1 minute to 1 day). If not present, the subscription will be auto-renewing.

argument.name: woe_ids
argument._content:
A 32-bit integer for a Where on Earth ID. Only valid if topic is geo.

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: place_ids
argument._content:
A comma-separated list of Flickr place IDs. Only valid if topic is geo.

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: lat
argument._content:
A latitude value, in decimal format. Only valid if topic is geo. Defines the latitude for a radial query centered around (lat, lon).

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: lon
argument._content:
A longitude value, in decimal format. Only valid if topic is geo. Defines the longitude for a radial query centered around (lat, lon).

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: radius
argument._content:
A radius value, in the units defined by radius_units. Only valid if topic is geo. Defines the radius of a circle for a radial query centered around (lat, lon). Default is 5 km.

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: radius_units
argument._content:
Defines the units for the radius parameter. Only valid if topic is geo. Options are mi and km. Default is km.

The order of precedence for geo subscriptions is : woe ids, place ids, radial i.e. the lat, lon parameters will be ignored if place_ids is present, which will be ignored if woe_ids is present.

argument.name: accuracy
argument._content:
Defines the minimum accuracy required for photos to be included in a subscription. Only valid if topic is geo Legal values are 1-16, default is 1 (i.e. any accuracy level).
  • World level is 1
  • Country is ~3
  • Region is ~6
  • City is ~11
  • Street is ~16

argument.name: nsids
argument._content: A comma-separated list of nsids representing Flickr Commons institutions (see flickr.commons.getInstitutions). Only valid if topic is commons. If not present this argument defaults to all Flickr Commons institutions.

argument.name: tags
argument._content: A comma-separated list of strings to be used for tag subscriptions. Photos with one or more of the tags listed will be included in the subscription. Only valid if the topic is tags.
